message: I think this is a fair split - you get a good starting point, and I get the majority. Let's get this done!

Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing a more balanced split.  This offer still gives you a good chunk of the money, and it allows me to benefit significantly as well.
Okay, I understand you want a larger share. Let's meet in the middle. This offer is fairer than the last one, but still gives you a solid amount.  Let's finish this!

Alice, we're running out of time and the money is losing value fast.  My previous offer was already generous, but I'm willing to be slightly more flexible. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
